item.title: How I Use Emacs
item.description: An explanation of how I use Emacs I'm honoured that you all have invited me to share my thoughts, and I especially appreciate the $50,000 advanced speakers' fee. A lot of people have asked me to write down how I use Emacs because they're curious how I use it every day since about a year.
